member.name: ImageLockMode
member.summary: The ImageLockMode enumeration specifies flags that are passed to theflags parameter of the method. The Bitmap.LockBits method locks a portion of an image so that you can read or write the pixel data.

member.name: ImageLockMode.ImageLockModeRead
member.summary: Specifies that a portion of the image is locked for reading.

member.name: ImageLockMode.ImageLockModeWrite
member.summary: Specifies that a portion of the image is locked for writing.

member.name: ImageLockMode.ImageLockModeUserInputBuf
member.summary: Specifies that the buffer used for reading or writing pixel data is allocated by the user. If this flag is set, then thelockedBitmapData parameter of the method serves as an input parameter (and possibly as an output parameter). If this flag is cleared, then thelockedBitmapData parameter serves only as an output parameter.
